name: 2.5Doll Demo
description:
A slow paced but DYNAMIC Boss Battle ACTION - RPG set in a world filled of Mannequins Beings !

Quick insight of my first INDIE GAME EVER, featuring Battle Mechanics, Art, FX and lots of other cool stuffs !

* Requirements for a better experience :

CPU: Intel i5

RAM: 8 GB RAM

GPU: Intel HD 4000

OS: Windows 7

Store: 8 GB Available space
